name: Jazz It Up
description:
Join a quartet of fuzzy animals as they play some relaxing jazz!

This game was made for Ludumdare 47. The theme was "Stuck in a Loop".

Featuring:

- Soulful tunes
- Adorable animals
- All around, smooooooth times

Team:
- Jonathan Hau-Yoon
- Mayur Vallabhjee
- Sabrina Becker
